title: Making Comparisons Relatable
text: Consider comparisons that your audience can easily relate to in everyday life.

title: Communicating quantities like speed
text: To communicate speed, unrealistic quantities such as the speed of a launching rocket may not be easily comprehended.

title: Role of Presenter
text: The role of the presenter is to make the data and comparisons easily understandable and clear to the audience without them having to do extra work.
